page.title: 07Westleigh emergency planning
page.content: Westleigh is a large house which stands in 10 acres of grounds.6 acres are owned by the Lancashire C.C.and 4 by the Regional Health Authority.The house is used as a disaster planning headquarters and sits on top of a nuclear bunker.Westleigh makes plans for peacetime disasters such as Rabies outbreaks,flooding,oil pollution, industrial emergencies and the Heysham Nuclear Power station if anything should go wrong.In wartime it would become a nuclear bunker which would become the control centre for the Lancashire area of Region 10 (Lancashire,Cumbria,Greater Manchester,Merseyside and the I.O.M) The Lancashire region has a standby headquarters near Lancaster and 12 other district centres, 363 community centres and 10 mobile units.{
